detail_desc: Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a decorative seam front and back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Socks in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend.
Fully-fashioned shoes with a decorative hole pattern, lacing at the top and a loop at the back. Canvas insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.

Quilted puffer jacket in a pearly shimmering weave. Detachable hood with embroidery and appliqués, a zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and narrow, concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Fitted V-neck blouse in a patterned weave with buttons down the front, long puff sleeves with pleats and buttoned cuffs, and a seam at the waist with a gently flared peplum.
Fitted jumper in a soft, rib knit with a turtle neck, visible zip at the top and long sleeves.
Pyjama bottoms in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Straight-cut jersey top with short sleeves that end in flounces in woven fabric.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Round shoulder bag in braided paper straw with two handles and a zip at the top, a narrow, imitation leather shoulder strap and an inner compartment. Lined. Depth 6.5 cm. Diameter 24.5 cm.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a concealed hood and zipped, stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with buttons down the front, chest pockets, side pockets and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs. Lined.

Pile-lined parka in a cotton weave with padded sleeves, a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a detachable faux-fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed pocket behind with a press-stud at the top. Elasticated tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and a small back vent. Lined.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Round shoulder bag in imitation leather with imitation suede details, a zip and shoulder strap at the top, and metal handles. One outer compartment. Lined. Size 5.5x22.5 cm.
Hi-tops in glittery imitation leather with a scuba shaft, loop front and back, mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Sock boots in imitation suede with round toes, covered heels and a soft, ankle-high shaft. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Short, sleeveless dress in soft cotton and modal jersey with a deep neckline and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a V-shaped waist.

Studio Collection. Straight-style jumper in a sturdy, heavily draping knit with a stand-up collar and seams down the front with various-sized flounces that continue around the back of the neck. Long, ribbed sleeves with a slit at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem with slits in the sides. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Trainers with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow, overlocked edges around the armholes and hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in soft denim with a small stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Decorative pocket flaps with a press-stud at the top, and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Unlined.
Shorts in printed, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.
Sandals with straps at the front and a wrapover ankle strap with an adjustable fastener. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Stand-up collar, a detachable hood with covered elastication, a zip and button band with press-studs down the front and raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Flap front pockets with a press-stud. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, details on the shoulders and short cap sleeves. Buttons down the front, elastication at the back of the waist, and a sewn-on tie belt. Satin lining.
Fine-knit trainer socks with decorative elastication at the top.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim. Looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen and cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.

Jacket in washed, stretch cotton denim with a reversible sequin motif on the back (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and embroidered text. Press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, and decorative pocket flaps with a press-stud at the front. Unlined.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Cylindrical sports bag in woven fabric with a text print. Adjustable shoulder strap with a metal carabiner hook at one end, two handles and a zip at the top. Two mesh compartments on one short side and a zipped outer compartment. Lined. Size 25x40 cm.
Short jersey T-shirt dress in a soft modal blend with studs at the neckline and sleeve-ends, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with hard-worn details, a high waist and zip fly and button.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sandals in imitation leather with glitter. Adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastener, and braided jute trims around the soles. Imitation suede insoles and fluted soles.
Blouse in airy, crinkled chiffon with a frill trim around the neckline and an opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck. Wide flounce at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and a print motif on one leg. Unlined.
3/4-length leggings in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and scalloped hems.
Chiffon blouse with decorative flounces, a V-neck, buttons down the front and long, wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Short, 5-pocket, low-rise shorts in soft, superstretch denim that showcase the body’s physique. Zip fly and button and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and bottoms in soft cotton jersey. Patterned T-shirt with a print motif. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Lightweight, unlined sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed shaft.
Trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets. Regular fit.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.

Calf-length dress in crinkled jersey with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and a seam at the waist. Short, elasticated sleeves with a frill trim. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Joggers in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and tapered legs. Wide, elasticated jersey panel at the top for best fit over the tummy.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, frills at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Thin metal chain necklaces with pendants in different designs. Adjustable length, 41-49 cm, 47-55 cm, 51.5-59 cm.
Laptop case in soft, grained leather with a flap and press-stud at the front and a cotton canvas lining. Size 25.5x36 cm. Suitable for laptops up to 13".
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Underwired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short-sleeved cotton jersey top in a relaxed fit with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with an all-over print, round neckline and an elasticated drawstring at the hem.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Leather mules with pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.

Fitted, sleeveless top in woven fabric with a square neckline and elasticated, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps. Cut-out section with wide ties at the back, a seam with a peplum at the waist and elastication at the back. Cotton weave lining.
Set with an Alice band and tail in faux fur. Alice band with appliqués in the shape of ears on top. Padded tail with ribbons and a hook and loop fastening. Length of tail approx. 35 cm.

Briefs in ribbed jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back. The polyamide content of the briefs is partly recycled.
Hat in a soft jacquard knit with a pompom on the top and a ribbed hem.

Imitation suede espadrilles with pointed toes, a braided jute trim around the soles and an adjustable imitation leather ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles, satin linings and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist, frills at the top and medium coverage at the back.

Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with a slight shimmer. Double flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Buttons at the back, a gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt. Lined. Matching, elasticated hairband with a bow.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a yoke at the back and a rounded hem.

Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a V-neck, narrow crossover shoulder straps and decorative straps at the back. Concealed zip in the side and a seam at the waist with a flared, tiered skirt. Lined.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a straight-cut back with a slit.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
